review:
Excellent operation performed by Dr. Girish Bhalerao who is a knee specialist. He is an expert/ specialist of injury that happens due to sports.
I had a knee injury and couldn’t bent my left leg, I consulted few orthopedic doctors but could not get better or got convinced of getting operated until I met Dr. Girish Bhalerao.
After the consultation the dr. explained me every detail of what had happened to my leg and what surgery would I require to get back to my original strength. He is so confident with his work that I wanted to get operated immediately.
I was so confident in the doctor because he uses every possible means to take out the fear of a patient and directs you to the truth and gives you correct informations. He uses 3D structures, 3D videos and videos of actual operation to explain everything. And behaves very calmly and joyful in situations.
On the day of operation I was guided and explained everything nicely. It was the best hospital visits ever in my life because it didn’t had anything to fear.
Along with it the staff was so cooperative and generous. They helped and did their duties wholeheartedly and by staying grounded.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Girish Bhalerao is a talented, friendly, and patient doctor. My mom and dad both consulted him at Worchard Hospital. He is knowledgeable and creates a safe environment for each patient. I highly recommend anyone to visit Dr. Girish anytime for safe and affordable treatment.

Hello everyone This is Mohsin Laddawala i stay at Mira Road, i am sharing my story today i was suffering with my lower back issue (L5, S1). I was not able sleep, walk neither stand properly i have consulted few doctors. But my pain was terrible and i was really down. Than i check online which is nearby Hospital where i can consult. I have seen couple of doctors and read the reviews than i thought let show to Dr. Girish Bhalerao.
I have went on 28th March 2020 and shown to Doctor he explain me very well & clear all my doubts and told that i need to go under surgery. I was little worried but he assure me & gave full confidence. After the surgery he made me “Brand New Man”. So he is very positive person and even hospital staff was very co-operative. So yes my experience was great. Thanks

Dr. Girish Bhalerao  is a great doctor! He’s very understanding and listens to your concerns. Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also, He is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. 

He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist. 
Dr. Girish Bhalerao
 Orthopedic Super Specialty Surgeon and Consultant at Wockhardt Hospitals Ltd

Thanks & Regards.
Mohd tariq siddiqui

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Treatment done well and always supportive. Diagnosis done properly.  Always proactive and give good suggestion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Girish Bhalerao is very friendly.  He examines the patient thoroughly and understands the problem. Post that he gives the right treatment.
